item.title: OpenAI 以每年 1 美元的价格向美国政府工作人员提供 ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI 正在向美国联邦机构提供其 ChatGPT 产品的访问权，每年只需象征性地支付 1 美元，以此推动其人工智能聊天机器人被更广泛地采用。【原文：OpenAI is providing access to its ChatGPT product to US federal agencies at a nominal cost of $1 a year as part of a push to get its AI chatbot more widely adopted.】

item.title: PineBridge 因稳定币的潜力而转为看涨美元
item.description: PineBridge 投资公司（PineBridge Investments）已在其多元资产投资组合中转向对美元的超配头寸，加密稳定币的爆炸式增长成为其押注美元的最新理由。【原文：PineBridge Investments has flipped to an overweight position on the dollar in its multi-asset portfolio, with the explosive growth of crypto stablecoins emerging as its newest reason to bet on the greenback.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利称近期降息可能是适当的
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，美国经济放缓可能会使降息在短期内变得合适，他仍然认为在年底前会有两次降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said a slowing of the US economy may make an interest-rate cut appropriate in the near term, and he still sees two cuts by year’s end.】

item.title: 电信网络之争是对卡尼人工智能战略的考验
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）领导的政府几天后就要做出一项关键决定，该决定将影响加拿大电信公司数十亿美元的投资；而这一决定却让业内最大的企业产生了分歧。【原文：Mark Carney’s government is days away from a key decision that’s poised to affect billions of investment from Canadian telecommunications companies — one that has divided the industry’s largest players.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织发出警告后，赞比亚债券在新兴市场跌幅最大
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）警告说，赞比亚偿还债务的能力仍然很弱，这打击了债券持有者对改善债券条件的希望，赞比亚的美元债券周三在新兴国家债券中跌幅居首。【原文：Zambia’s dollar-denominated bonds led losses among emerging peers on Wednesday after the IMF warned that the country’s capacity to service its debt remains weak, dampening bondholders’ hopes for improved terms.】

item.title: 沙特开发商 3.36 亿美元 IPO 吸引 360 亿美元订单
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯 Dar Al Majed 房地产公司的首次公开募股吸引了 1,350 亿里亚尔（约合 360 亿美元）的订单，其 3.36 亿美元的首次公开募股吸引了 1,350 亿里亚尔（约合 360 亿美元）的订单，因为外国所有权规则的放宽激发了人们对沙特房地产市场的兴趣。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Dar Al Majed Real Estate Co. drew 135 billion riyals ($36 billion) in orders for its $336 million initial public offering, as liberalized foreign ownership rules spark interest in the kingdom’s property market.】

item.title: 特朗普与苹果公司宣布新的 1000 亿美元美国投资计划
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将宣布，苹果公司将承诺再投入 1,000 亿美元用于国内生产，这是这家科技巨头为避免对其旗舰产品 iPhone 征收惩罚性关税而增加美国产品生产的最新承诺。【原文：President Donald Trump will announce that Apple Inc. will commit to spend another $100 billion on domestic manufacturing, the latest pledge by the tech giant to increase US production of its products as it seeks to avoid punishing tariffs on its flagship iPhones.】

item.title: 对关税的担忧扰乱咖啡市场，阿拉比卡期货下跌
item.description: 在美国对来自最大种植国巴西的商品征收巨额关税之前，阿拉比卡咖啡期货在震荡交投中下跌。【原文：Arabica coffee futures dropped in volatile trading ahead of steep US tariffs on goods from top grower Brazil.】

item.title: 医疗技术公司 Heartflow 将 IPO 目标提高到 3 亿美元
item.description: Heartflow Inc. 将首次公开募股的潜在规模提高到了 3 亿美元。【原文：Heartflow Inc. increased the potential size of its initial public offering to as much as $300 million.】

item.title: 扎布卡提高开店目标，盈利超出预期
item.description: 由于消费需求依然强劲，波兰连锁便利店 Zabka Group SA 已上调了其在国内市场和罗马尼亚的新店开业指导。【原文：Polish convenience store chain Zabka Group SA has raised its guidance for new store openings in its home market and Romania as consumer demand remains robust.】

item.title: 印度家庭认为明年通胀将放缓
item.description: 印度中央银行的调查显示，印度家庭预计明年包括食品在内的所有主要产品类别的价格压力都将大幅下降。【原文：Indian households expect a significant decline in price pressures over the next year across all major product categories, including food, according to surveys conducted by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 非洲顶级银行家称 20 国集团需要修复债务改革框架
item.description: 非洲开发银行前副行长说，20 国集团应考虑改进其针对穷国的债务重组框架。【原文：The Group of 20 should consider improving its debt restructuring framework for poor nations, the former vice president of the African Development Bank said.】

item.title: 华尔街向快速交易的转型正在为信贷带来回报
item.description: 华尔街长期以来担心的水管改造正在取得成效，并释放出数十亿美元的资金。【原文：A long-feared change to Wall Street’s plumbing is paying off — and it’s freeing up billions.】

item.title: 据说 Blackstone 同意以 60 亿美元以上的价格收购 Enverus
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士称，Blackstone Inc. 已同意收购 Enverus，该能源数据平台的估值可能超过 60 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has agreed to an acquisition of Enverus that could value the energy data platform at more than $6 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 六旗公司因天气原因下调预测，启动首席执行官继任计划
item.description: 六旗娱乐公司（Six Flags Entertainment Corp. ）在恶劣的天气条件限制了入场人数后股价暴跌，导致该主题公园运营商下调了全年业绩展望。该公司还宣布其长期首席执行官即将卸任。【原文：Six Flags Entertainment Corp. tumbled after poor weather conditions limited attendance, leading the theme-park operator to slash its full year outlook. It also announced its long-standing chief executive is stepping down.】

item.title: Shopify 因收入超预期、第三季度前景强劲而反弹
item.description: Shopify Inc. 上季度营收和第三季度业绩超出预期，股价随之大涨。【原文：Shopify Inc. shares jumped after last quarter’s revenue and its third-quarter outlook beat expectations.】

item.title: 印度 RBI 小组建议为银行提供灵活的融资窗口
item.description: 印度储备银行的一个小组建议央行采取更灵活的方式来管理向贷款人提供资金的方式，此举旨在确保实体经济更清楚地感受到借贷成本的变化。【原文：A Reserve Bank of India panel has recommended that the central bank take a more flexible approach to managing how it provides money to lenders, a move aimed at ensuring changes in borrowing costs are more clearly felt in the real economy.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德发布人工智能基础设施发展战略
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）正在推出一项专注于开发人工智能基础设施的专门战略，以期利用数据中心的蓬勃发展。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management is launching a dedicated strategy focused on developing infrastructure for artificial intelligence as it looks to capitalize on a boom in data centers.】

item.title: 预测乐观后，优步将回购金额提高 200 亿美元
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）在公布了好于预期的第三季度预测和季度业绩后，宣布回购 200 亿美元的新股票，这表明其核心的乘车和外卖业务仍有增长空间。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. announced $20 billion in new stock buybacks after sharing a better-than-expected third-quarter forecast and quarterly results, suggesting that growth at its core rideshare and delivery units still has room to pick up steam.】

item.title: 波斯尼亚选举机构剥夺塞族领导人的总统授权
item.description: 在法院作出维持米洛拉德-多迪克的刑期并禁止他担任总统的裁决后，波斯尼亚当局取消了米洛拉德-多迪克作为塞族人统治的巴尔干半壁江山总统的任期。【原文：Bosnia’s authorities canceled the mandate of Milorad Dodik as the president of the Serb-run half of the Balkan country, following a court ruling that upheld his prison term and banned him from office.】

item.title: 迪士尼股价下跌，原因是付费电视的困境盖过了乐园和流媒体的影响
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司周三早盘股价下跌，此前这家媒体和娱乐公司公布的第三季度业绩令一些投资者失望。【原文：Walt Disney Co. shares fell in early trading Wednesday after the media and entertainment company reported third-quarter results that disappointed some investors.】

item.title: 能源价格暴跌，Glencore 金属交易商获利创新高
item.description: Glencore Plc 的金属交易商刚刚创下了有史以来最好的半年业绩，而他们的能源和煤炭交易同行却连利润都难以实现。【原文：Glencore Plc’s metals traders just notched up their best half-yearly performance on record, yet their energy and coal-trading peers struggled to even turn a profit.】

item.title: 国防股涨势停滞，寻找盈利催化剂
item.description: 今年夏天，欧洲国防类股票的大幅反弹已经停滞，因为投资者对军事预算不断扩大的乐观情绪已经转变为对何时才能在公司订单中得到充分反映的不耐烦。【原文：A huge rally in European defense stocks has stalled this summer, as investor optimism over expanding military budgets turns to impatience about when this will be reflected fully in company order books.】
